title: twelve men and one woman, including woman in center wearing light colored dress tied at neckline, dark hat, and light colored tag pinned to right shoulder, standing in front of audience and man standing with microphone, in interior of Penn Sheraton hotel with large light colored projection screen, half moon louvered wall sconces, coffered ceiling, dark vignette patterned curtains, eight spoked circular ceiling fixtures, and chalkboard inscribed ""Trustees...1. Douglas, 2. Grant, 3. Smart, 4. Yancy, 5. Dumas, 6. Leach,  7. J.L.M..."
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
